segments.text: How is your business on the Internet , Steven ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't mention it . I lost a bunch of money on it this year . I think it is on the brink of bankruptcy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry to hear that . It shows that you should buy companies , not ideas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I changed my strategy around too . I am investing in good companies now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I agree with you . I am going to find a good company and invest in it soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a good idea . But please be careful when you invest this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will . I should learn more from you . After all I am green hand on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you have any question , you can ask me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . My wife sent me a message and asked me to go home just now . I am leaving .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Let's chat next time . Bye-bye .
segments.speaker: S2
